title: Add SQL query generator for .cos files
description: Create SQLCodeGenerator that compiles .cos DSL to SQL queries/stored procedures for database-side calculations. Useful for batch processing and data pipelines.

title: Add comprehensive integration tests
description: Add end-to-end tests that parse .cos files, compile to JS, execute in Node.js, and validate outputs against known test cases. Currently missing full pipeline tests.

title: Add TypeScript output support
description: JSCodeGenerator has typescript flag but doesn't fully implement .d.ts generation. Add proper TypeScript output with declaration files for better IDE support.

title: Add Python code generator for .cos files
description: Create PythonCodeGenerator class that compiles .cos DSL to standalone Python functions with type hints, similar to JSCodeGenerator. Should generate functions that can be imported and used in Python applications.
